job.title: Website Data Analyst - Consumer Based Website Analysis
job.description: If you are a Website Data Analyst with 3+ years of experience, please read on! Website Data Analyst Boston MA $100-120K Based on experience Bachelor's Degree in Data/Applied Statistics/Math or Computer Science field preferred  This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking to join a growing team in a dynamic industry! Take your career to the next level! What's In It for You What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Website Data Analyst with 3+ years of experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Jenn.Parrella@CyberCoders.com Jenn Parrella - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
